title: Oru Kannil Vegam Lyrics Samar Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Oru kannil vegam
Singer(s): K.G. Ranjith, Naveen Madhav, Suchitra
Lyrics: Na. Muthukumar
Movie: Samar
Music : Yuvan Shankar Raja
Other Song Lyrics

Oru Kannil Vegam

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
we are talking about a man
who knows the fear
he is taking a mission to it
we are talking about a man
who stand with it
he make it make it a deal with it
samar samar samaran
he is coming ...
you better turn around
samar samar samaran
ha ha yeah!! . he is the one...

Oru kannil vegam, maru kannil thaagam
ivan oru kaattu aruvi

Mannodum irupaan, vinnodum parapaan
ivan oru vettai kuruvi

Ettaadha megam polivan
pattraadha moongil kaadivan
mullaiku thandha thaer ivan
kaattaalan thaanada

Kattraadha kaatari pol ivan
kuththadha kombu maan ivan
ettaadha uyaram thaan ivan
kooraana vazhada ..

paniyayi oru maalai seivaan
ivan yaaro ivan yaari ivan yaaro

kaadellaam kalloorithaan
